text: Inn mein say woh bhi hain jo payghumbar ko ezza detay hain kehtay hain kay kaan ka kacha hai aap keh dijiye kay woh kaan tumharay bhalay kay liye hai woh Allah per eman rakha hai aur musalamanon ki baaton ka yaqeen kerta hai aur tum mein say jo ehal-e-eman hain yeh unn kay liye rehmat hai rasool Allah (PBUH) ko jo log ezze detay hain unn kay liye dukh ki maar hai
